reviews.text:
Would be nice to change temperature in room rather than on or off. Would be nice to have tea/coffee making facility in room. Clean spacious and comfortable. Great location.
One problem in bar with nut allergy not being advertised but dealt with efficiently

We stayed on November 12, 2024. The rooms were quite spacious and comfortable. The breakfast was satisfying. The location is very close to the main square. Having numerous elevators in the hotel made accessing the floors much easier. Highly recommended.

Comfortable hotel with excellent buffet breakfast. Just a little outside the main tourist area but walkable.
The interior, including the rooms, is a little worn but it is clean.
Well heated in the winter which is really important in the depths of the Brussels winter.

I can only recommend this hotel. It is very central. The rooms are big and clean. Compared to much more modern hotels on our trip in Belgium, I would prefer this one. Price was very good. People at the reception very nice and professional. The roof top bar incredible. We will be back.

Service are excellent,  from front desk, room Service, the guy who collect the ticket on breakfast room and the guy who called for our taxi. Everyone has a good customer service in this hotel.
Location closed to Maineken pis, grand palace. Brussel central station like 12 minutes walk.
The room is clean.
The only downside about this hotel is outdated.
